thread.title: Student dies while taking selfie, hit by train he wanted in backdrop
thread.title_full: Student dies while taking selfie, hit by train he wanted in backdrop

title: Student dies while taking selfie, hit by train he wanted in backdrop
text:
Engg student dies while taking selfie in TN, hit by train he wanted in backdrop india Updated: Jan 01, 2017 19:42 IST PTI, Coimbatore A person holds a selfie stick as the sun sets over a body of water in the Camargue on New Years Eve (AFP Photo/Representative Image) 
A 21-year-old engineering student died when he was hit by a speeding train while trying to click a selfie here in the wee hours on Sunday, police said. 
The incident occurred past midnight when the student was returning after celebrating New Year, they said. 
Gunasekharan, a resident of Dindigul district studying at a private college in the cityâ€™s outskirt, died on the spot when he was trying to click a selfie with the train in the background using his mobile phone, police said. 
The victim was hit by the train and hurled at a distance of around 100 feet, they said.
